value.content:
Review:  I've worked in this sector, this pizzeria leaves something to be desired, I bought two pizzas, I found the place very dirty, dirt in the place where the attendant sweeps the room, places an order, handles money, handles dough and never washes hands, In the salon, the dirt did not identify with the products sold, the masses on display. Selling cheaply doesn't make us subject to eating anything, especially the quality of the pizzas, which also leave a lot to be desired. Just because I pay a dollar at a bar doesn't mean I have to eat only onions anyway. Just because the pizza costs 14.99 doesn't mean the dough has to be thin and the toppings scarce. More care is needed because those who purchase their products are human beings. Stop for a moment and take stock of yourself. Change the situation, place yourself as a customer, not a trader.
Establishment: Pizzeria Castelo Express
Date: July 30, 2020.
Location: Cidade Tiradentes, Sao Paulo.

value.content:
Review:  Esfirra of terrible quality...my money wasted...it left something to be desired...the caturiry chicken was horrible, poor quality, the caturiry tasted like cornstarch...the dough was super heavy... pitiful.I don't recommend it to anyone.
Establishment: Pizzeria Antonietta 
Date: April 08, 2023.
Location: Cidade Tiradentes, Sao Paulo.
